title: Motor Load Imbalance Detection
description: Detect if the load of an electric motor is balanced or not
long_description: This project allows you to develop an AI model capable of detecting imbalances in the motor load while the motor is operating. The model is suitable for real-time, low powered embedded applications in industrial machines (conveyers, pumps, compressors), automotive systems (Electrical Vehicle motors, actuators), etc.
